content.title: Denel admits bursary granted to Supra Mahumapelo's son was illegal - EWN
content.desc: It emerged in April that a R1 million bursary had been awarded to Oarabile Mahumapelo to attend flight school.

content.title: 'I'm now a real MEC' – new North West health MEC who previously served under Mahumapelo - News24
content.desc: Madoda Sambatha, axed by former North West premier Supra Mahumapelo, is once again an MEC in the province.
